W, A, S, D or Arrow keys - Movement

Shift - Sprint

E key - Interact (pick-up keys, open door)

Hold right mouse button - Focus (Use echolocation)

Esc key - Pause

In-game controls menu:

They Listen is a game of sensory deprivation. It is set in a post apocalyptic world where humanity has been invaded by sightless invisible creatures of unknown origin. These creatures are able to detect you through sound and echolocation.

You play a character who has survived the first wave of the creatures, and is now having to survive alone. After accidentally stumbling and falling onto the crisp autumn leaves, you suddenly get to your feet and run to a nearby house that seems to be abandoned.

After the door being locked behind you, you soon realize that you are not the only one roaming the house. You must find the keys in order to escape.

Use your focus in order to see the invisible creature. Use sparingly!

Do not make a sound, or else...

Use echolocation to detect invisible creatures.

Find 8 keys to unlock the door to escape.

Experience a stealth horror.

Deprived of sensing the creature.
